article.title: Lockheed Martin to Replace Aging Antenna Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Information Systems & Global Solutions, Santa Maria, California, was awarded a $7 million contract for four adaptable multi-based land/ocean stabilized antenna systems to replace aging antenna systems.Â U.S. Air Force Space and Missile Systems Center, Kirtland Air Force Base, New Mexico, is the contracting activity.
